info.name: Wedding Invitation System API
info.description: API documentation for Wedding Invitation System

item.name: Authentication
item.description: Authentication endpoints for obtaining API tokens

request.description: Get all contacts for the authenticated admin.
Search contacts with pagination and filtering.
Get all contacts with failed invitation status.

query.description: Optional: Filter by status (belum_dikirim, terkirim, gagal)

request.description: Export contacts as JSON data. Optional status filter.

response.name: Successful response

request.description: Reset the invitation status of a contact to 'belum_dikirim'.

response.name: Successful response
response.body:
{
    "status": "success",
    "message": "Status undangan berhasil direset.",
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "admin_id": 1,
        "name": "Ahmad Rizky",
        "username": "ahmad-rizky",
        "phone_number": "81234567890",
        "country": "ID",
        "country_code": "62",
        "greeting": "Pak Ahmad",
        "invitation_status": "belum_dikirim",
        "sent_at": null,
        "created_at": "2023-05-01T10:00:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2023-05-01T15:00:00.000000Z"
    }
}

request.description: Reset the invitation status of all contacts or filtered by status.
